item.title: Make AI your assistant for less than a pizza
item.description: Learn ChatGPT, Gemini, and DALL-E for $24.97 with these online courses.

item.title: Scan, share, and even fax with this app — $130 off
item.description: SwiftScan VIP is an OCR scanner app for iOS or Android that can edit, share, and even fax your high-quality scans, and it's only $59.99.

item.title: The ultimate $14.99 key hack for busy city dwellers
item.description: Keep your keys and AirTag organized with the KeySmart AirFlex 5-key organizer, available for $19.99.

item.title: Store and protect your memories with FolderFort’s 1TB lifetime plan
item.description: Enjoy lifetime access to 1TB of secure cloud storage with FolderFort and store photos, videos, and documents with ease.

item.title: This beginner-friendly camera drone avoids obstacles and is only $65
item.description: This 4K Dual-Camera Drone is easy on beginners with three-way obstacle avoidance and one-key takeoff and landing. Get it while it's on sale for $64.97.

item.title: The 7 best noise-cancelling headphones of 2024
item.description: The Mashable team tested tons of noise-cancelling headphones. These eight pairs from Bose, Sony, Apple, and Anker Soundcore earned our stamp of approval.
